tags.name: wc-info-base
tags.description: Non-themed. Display Web Component Information based on web-components.json file.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Url where Web Component Information is contained.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: href
properties.description: Url where Web Component Information is contained.

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

slots.name: test
slots.description: this is just a slot for testing purposes.
